# AIC analysis
```{r}
# main 3 variables (speed + distance + npp)
longline_model_three <- glm(formula = Fishing_Activity ~ Vessel_Speed + Distance_From_Shore + NPP_Mean, 
                            family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = combined_data)

step(longline_model_three)
# call same, AIC = 3454
```
```{r}
# all variables (except time) / main 3 + lat + long + Date
str(combined_data)

longline_model_latlong <- glm(formula = Fishing_Activity ~ MMSI+ Vessel_Speed + Distance_From_Shore + NPP_Mean + Latitude + Longitude + Date, family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = combined_data)

step(longline_model_latlong)
# call same vars, AIC = 2730

summary(longline_model_latlong)
```

# Combined Data -- GLM (speed + dist + npp) 
```{r}
# build model relationship (combined data, main 3 vars)
longline_model_main3 <- glm(formula = Fishing_Activity ~ Vessel_Speed + Distance_From_Shore + NPP_Mean, 
                            family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = combined_data)
# summarize results
summary(longline_model_main3)
```
```{r}
# look at individual correlations
par(mfrow=c(2,3))
termplot(longline_model_main3, ylim="common", rug=TRUE) # rug = shows distribution of points
mtext("GLM, Free YLIM", side=3, line=-2, outer=TRUE)
```
# Combined Data -- Null Deviance
```{r}
null_dev = summary(longline_model_main3)$null.deviance
res_dev = summary(longline_model_main3)$deviance

print(c("Null Deviance:", null_dev, "Residual Deviance:", res_dev))

dev_expl = ((null_dev - res_dev) / null_dev) * 100
print(c("Percent Deviance Explained:", dev_expl))

```
